ModMetaData.name: [ATW] Ridiculous Muffalo Variety
ModMetaData.author: MG_Atwood
ModMetaData.description:
Ever felt your colonists need more muffalo colours in their lives? Now they can have a ridiculous number! This mod adds over 130 bovid-based muffalo coat variations so even Muffalo 43 can feel special.
This mod shouldn't affect muffalo variants added by other mods, only the vanilla muffalo. Load after Animal Variety Coats, Vanilla Textures Expanded or any other texture-altering mods that affect vanilla muffalo.
